root.name: Chibi Maruko-Chan: Go Chounai Minna de Game Dayo!
root.description: OverviewChibi Maruko-Chan: Go Chounai Minna de Game Dayo! is a game developed and published by Epoch Co. for the Game Boy Color platform. Chibi Maruko-Chan: Go Chounai Minna de Game Dayo! was never released outside of Japan.
